text: Axel Gehrke (born 12 January 1942) is a German politician for the populist Alternative for Germany (AfD) and since 2017 member of the Bundestag. ==Life and politics== Gehrke was born 1942 in Choszczno and studied medicine and became a Doctor of Medicine in 1971. Gehrke entered the newly founded AfD in 2013 and became after the 2017 German federal election member of the bundestag. ==References== Category:Living people Category:1942 births Category:Alternative for Germany politicians Category:Members of the Bundestag 2017–2021 Category:Members of the Bundestag for the Alternative for Germany Category:Members of the Bundestag for Schleswig-Holstein
title: Axel Gehrke
